import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { isMobileMenuOpen = false; toggleMobileMenu(): void { this.isMobileMenuOpen = !this.isMobileMenuOpen; } }
